mapper.select: select * from ( select '01' as category_code, board_seq, drama_title as title, drama_producer as producer, drama_images as images, a.genre_name, drama_hit as ratings from drama_tbl dr, genre_tbl a where a.genre_code = dr.genre_code union all select '04' as category_code, board_seq, movie_title as title, movie_producer as producer, movie_images as images, a.genre_name, movie_hit as ratings from movie_tbl movie, genre_tbl a where a.genre_code = movie.genre_code ) A where A.title like concat('${keyword}','%') or A.producer like concat('${keyword}','%')
